reviewText: We have bought this DVD a lot its one of our sons favorites!  We watch it until we wear them out. Very good solid DVDs and wonderful christian music

The songs are nice and some of the video is okay.  But much of it looks like it was made in someone's home with their personal video camera.  I would not pay any money for this.  I received it as a gift for my daughter and she enjoys the music for a while and looking for the bullfrog but the quality of the video is poor at best.  And she gets bored with it pretty quickly because of that.  There are clips of children that appear to be pulled directly from someone's home video, two children just pounding on a piano, I don't know how a company can create something like this and charge so much money for it, it's just not worth it.
